question_text: Which statement best describes the long-term impact of Apple’s use of the Lightning connector?
answer_options: It ensured compatibility across all Android manufacturers
It created a closed ecosystem around Apple accessories
It allowed cross-platform charging with USB-B adapters
It enabled fiber optic video output by default
correct_answer: It created a closed ecosystem around Apple accessories
explanation: Apple’s proprietary Lightning port encouraged customers to buy Apple-certified accessories, strengthening the company’s device ecosystem.
